snippet.title: NBA Playgrounds Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
NBA Playgrounds is now available on Nintendo Switch, PC (Steam), PlayStation 4, and Xbox One!  Classic NBA arcade action is back!  Take your “A” game to the playground and beat the best in high-flying 2-on-2 basketball action.  

Play Now!

Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/545270

Nintendo Switch: 
http://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/nba-playgrounds-switch

Xbox One: 
https://www.microsoft.com/en-US/store/p/NBA-Playgrounds/BWD1BSW764RV?rtc=1
